memberdef.argsstring: (self, str text="", int x=0, int y=0)
memberdef.name: __init__

para.verbatim: Draw the label and its components.
Update the label and its components.
Update the shadow's position of the label.
Center the label horizontally relative to the specified parent, then return the label itself.
Center the label vertically relative to the specified parent, then return the label itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height)
memberdef.name: center

para.verbatim: Center the label on both axes relative to the specified parent, then return the label itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int parent_x, int parent_y, int parent_width, int parent_height, int x, int y)
memberdef.name: center_with_offset

para.verbatim: Center the label with center() and offset it by x and y relative to the specified parent, then return the label itself.

memberdef.argsstring: (self, int width, int height, int max_width, int max_height)
